description:
It turns out that Verde, this whole time, was not actually Verde, but a robot!? Then where is the real Verde? If they don’t find him, they can’t get his seal. What`s more, the real Verde may be plotting yet another attack. Verde himself might not even be hiding within the limits of Namimori. The guardians are overcome with fear. Just then, Tsuna’s hyper senses detect something. Time is running out before they have to return to the future. Will Tsuna and his friends be able to collect all of the seals before time runs out?
Source: crunchyroll
